import BookView from './BookView'; const Bookshelf = ({ books }) => { return (

Currently Reading

    {books.map((book) =>
    2. )}

Want to Read

    {books.map((book) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    {book.shelf}
    2. )}

Read

    {books.map((book) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    {book.shelf}
    2. )}
) } export default Bookshelf;
